ygData.subject: RE: FP helmets?
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I ve seen they drop from the Guards inside West and East FP fairly often (not sure if all the time since I ve only killed 4 of them and in my case I
ygData.messageBody:
From what I've seen they drop from the Guards inside West and East FP fairly
often (not sure if all the time since I've only killed 4 of them and in my
case I got them all 4 times)..

On a side note I did see my first full Dark Forge SK this weekend (a lvl 28
I might add).. I'm still undecided on the looks, personally I think I like
the Silver\Black look more still.



-----Original Message-----
From: johan.norrman@...
[mailto:johan.norrman@...]
Sent: Monday, November 08, 1999 10:04 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] FP helmets?


From: johan.norrman@...

does anyone know if all guards
drop the helmets? ive killed some
but i havent found any helmets yet.


Aacq @ VZ
